title: Group portrait of groom, wearing moustache, light colored bow tie, and light colored carnation on left lapel, standing behind bride, wearing mid length veil, earrings, necklace, light colored wedding dress with scalloped lace collar, long sheer sleeves, and full skirt with sheer overlay, holding knife in right hand, gathered behind table with light colored tablecloth, flowers, and four tiered wedding cake, in interior with light colored walls, pipe, and man seated on right
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
